T02D2874:216b-1: shr'i badzra p'a ni n'i l'am ba ra dha ra
T02D2874:216b-2: dh'a ra ni kal pam ba la ti bi dhi
T02D2874:216b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2874:216b-5: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2874:216b-6: slob dpon dang ni sgrub pa pos //
T02D2874:216b-7: bsnyen pa dang ni sgrub pa dang //
T02D2874:216b-8: dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg dang //
T02D2874:216b-9: gzhan yang lha rnams mnyes pa dang //
T02D2874:216b-10: bgegs zhi ba dang nyams pa bskang //
T02D2874:216b-12: phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad dang //
T02D2874:216b-13: dgar dang gsad dang dgug pa dang //
T02D2874:216b-14: gzir dang bcings dang mnan pa dang //
T02D2874:216b-15: rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus //
T02D2874:216b-16: zhi dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang //
T02D2874:217a-2: las rnams nye bar 'grub pa dang //
T02D2874:217a-3: thun mong mchog dang dngos grub dang //
T02D2874:217a-4: bsod nams chen po thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2874:217a-5: yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu dang //
T02D2874:217a-6: brgyad dang bcu bzhi nya stong ngam //
T02D2874:217a-7: yang na rgyun nam dus drug tu //
T02D2874:217a-8: rtag tu gtor ma'i las rnams bya //
T02D2874:217a-9: rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga //
T02D2874:217a-10: 'bru dang shing thog sman rnams dang //
T02D2874:217a-11: chan thug khur ba dkar gsum mngar //
T02D2874:217a-12: sha khrag rus pa snying sna rnams //
T02D2874:217a-14: sbrul dang spal lcong nya sha rnams //
T02D2874:217a-15: de sogs drag po'i thun rdzas so //
T02D2874:217a-16: cho ga gsum mam skad cig mas //
T02D2874:217a-17: 'dod pa'i lha rnams bskyed byas la //
T02D2874:217a-19: bsnyen sgrub dus dang mthun par bya //
T02D2874:217a-20: bdag mchod lha rnams mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02D2874:217a-21: mtshan ldan rdo rje ka p'a lar //
T02D2874:217a-22: rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang byas te //
T02D2874:217a-23: ya las rlung ste ram me spar //
T02D2874:217a-24: de steng aa las ka p'a lar //
T02D2874:217a-25: de 'og ye shes lnga ldan gsum //
T02D2874:217a-26: go ku da ha na las ni //
T02D2874:217a-27: lcags kyu lnga po bskyed par bya //
T02D2874:217a-28: bi mu ma ra shu las ni //
T02D2874:217a-29: bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bskyed //
T02D2874:217a-30: dpa' bo lnga yis rab sbyangs te //
T02D2874:217a-31: zla stengs aom las rdo rje h'um //
T02D2874:217a-32: de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can //
T02D2874:217a-33: sngo bskyod me sbar rdzas rnams bskol //
T02D2874:217a-34: 'od kyis ri bong rtse lnga zhu //
T02D2874:217a-35: thim pas bdud rtsi'i ngo bor gnas //
T02D2874:217a-36: ye shes lnga yi yig 'bru las //
T02D2874:217a-37: 'od kyis gang g'a'i klung sogs kyi //
T02D2874:217a-38: bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis med bstim //
T02D2874:217a-39: 'bru gsum sngags kyi byin gyis brlab //
T02D2874:217a-40: lhag pa'i lha dang bla ma dang //
T02D2874:217a-41: dkon mchog gsum dang chos skyong rnams //
T02D2874:217a-42: lce yi rdo rjes bdud rtsi len //
T02D2874:217a-43: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni
T02D2874:217a-44: ba lim ai dam gri hna gri hna kh'a hi
T02D2874:217a-45: kh'a hi bhum dza ho ba lingta kh'a hi //
T02D2874:217a-46: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a
T02D2874:217a-47: dya nutpa nna tv'ata aom a'a:h'um zhes bsnyen pa'i dus
T02D2874:217a-48: su dbul lo // de rjes sgrub pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D2874:217a-49: gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02D2874:217a-50: aa las bandha'i nang dag tu //
T02D2874:217a-51: mam las sha yi phung po bskyed //
T02D2874:217a-52: kem las rus pa'i pho brang las //
T02D2874:217a-53: ra las rakta'i rgya mtsho bskyil //
T02D2874:217a-54: sha khrag rus par byin brlabs la //
T02D2874:217a-55: dug gsum dmar gyi mchod pa 'di //
T02D2874:217a-56: drag po'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D2874:217a-57: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni /
T02D2874:217b-0: ma ma sarba sha @217b tum aa mu ka'i ma
T02D2874:217b-1: dzdza me d'a b'a sa m'am sa dz'i bam bu
T02D2874:217b-2: gam ru dhe ra pr'i ya ku ru bhaksha ni
T02D2874:217b-3: ai dam ba lim gri hna gri hna kh'a hi
T02D2874:217b-5: rakta p'i ba ta aa ti kra ma sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2874:217b-7: las sbyor drag po'i dus dag tu //
T02D2874:217b-8: gta' yi gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02D2874:217b-9: spal lcong nya sha'i gtor ma bsham //
T02D2874:217b-10: gzas pa po yi ling ga la //
T02D2874:217b-11: sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2874:217b-12: rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed bya ste //
T02D2874:217b-13: bkug ste gru gsum kha bcad gzir //
T02D2874:217b-15: las kyi gnod sbyin tshogs la dbul //
T02D2874:217b-16: yaksha n'i l'am pa ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02D2874:217b-17: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye che ge
T02D2874:217b-18: mo'i srog la shag shag ma ma sarba shat'um aa
T02D2874:217b-20: de nas bstod cing smon lam btab //
T02D2874:217b-21: thod chen rnga brdung 'phrin las bcol //
T02D2874:217b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yis //
T02D2874:217b-23: rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02D2874:217b-24: go bgo lus bsrung brtan par bya //
T02D2874:217b-25: rang nyid nga rgyal ci bder gnas //
T02D2874:217b-26: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
